transcript:
Customer: Hello

Customer: Hello

Customer: Hello
Executive: Ji good afternoon sir, Vineet baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Good evening sir.
Executive: Sir wohi discussion pending tha, maine message kiya hua tha, lagta hai aap thoda occupied the uss time pe.
Customer: Haan maine haan maine diya hai account mein, process ho jayega, mai confirm karta hu.
Executive: Kab tak sir aap revert karenge iske upar?
Customer: Kal mera to trick mein nahi wapis. I will recheck doctor. Kya keh rahe hai sir? Kal to nahi.
Executive: Bhai ek kal to nahi hone wala, parso actually kal mera appointment hai sir hospital mein. Mai parso aapko confirm karta hu. Iss week mein 100% start ho jayega aapka iss week mein.
Customer: Sir actually date na bahut di ho chuki hai, aapke kehne pe phir maine hold karaya tha. Ki abhi hum log download na karein. Kyunki hamara bhi promotion kharab hoga. Ab woh maine aapne kaha ki kal for sure ho jayega, balki aapne mere ko bola to maine mail pe update kiya hua tha.
Executive: Mai aaya tha, mai aaya tha.
Customer: Mai aaya tha sir, account mein de diya hai. Packet bhi maine hamare management team se baat kiya hai sir. Ho jayega payment aapka.
Customer: Sir wohi hai thoda sa timeline ka boundation hai, aapko to maine sari situation batai hai. Ki bada problem hai aisa koi time. Ek to sir price ka thoda sa bada problem hai. Matlab agar aap comfortable rehte do teen din pehle to mere liye bhi bahut easy ho jata. Ab kya ho gaya sir end mein hum log approval lete lete lete isko bahut extend kar rahe hai. Ki hamara price na kahi bhi aage jaake badh jaaye.
Executive: Sahi baat hai.
Executive: Sahi baat hai.
Customer: To sir I would ab aap dekh lijiye sir agar ho sakta hai kisi bhi tarike se aaj, mai isliye aapko sir baar baar force nahi kar raha, aapne bola tha ki mai karunga for sure karunga, aap mere ko baar baar pareshan na karo. To maine isliye sir aapko call karna chhod diya, isliye mai message hi kar raha hu.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm.
Customer: Lekin sir mere ko bhi upar aap samajhiye ki mere ko bhi jawab dena pad raha hai upar, to mere liye bada ho jata hai.
Executive: Sahi baat hai, sahi baat hai. Sahi baat hai. Sir abhi maine diya hai management ki ho gayi hai baat account mein, mai karta hu sir aapko confirm, ho jayega payment.
Customer: Kab tak sir? Kab tak aap confirmation de sakte hai? To mai aage yehi update karu.
Executive: Sir sir ab hamari management ki team ho gayi hai account mein diya hai lekin kal to mera appointment hai hospital mein to kal nahi aane wala mai sir actually. To mai ek batata hu aapko.
Customer: Sir ho gaya hai maine 28 ho gaya hai under bolo.
Customer: Sir nahi matlab approval to ho gaya hai, matlab mai aapse puch raha hu ki aap payment kis din process kar payenge? Ya kab process kar payenge? Mera manna tha sir aap aaj kar dete process to maine yehi update kiya hua hai. Ab woh sab cheeze thoda sa kyunki aap samajhiye aap hi mere ko bolte hai to mai aage time deta hu aapke kehne pe.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm hmm.
Customer: To aap meri bhi thodi majburi samajhne ki koshish karo sir 20 tarikh ko karna tha humko 20 tarikh 25 ho gayi hai. Mai hold karate karate woh to beech mein Saturday Sunday aa gaya to thoda sa mere ko grace mil gaya. Ki do din kisi ne update nahi liya. Ab woh har din sham ko 6 baje mere ko mail aa jata hai. Ki what is the update on this approval?
Executive: Okay okay okay.
Customer: Sir isme decision matlab aapko hi lena hai ya koi aur bhi hai jo involved hai is decision mein?
Executive: Sir process hota hai hamari company ka. Sabhi taraf se approval lena padta hai account mein se jaate hai approval ke liye payment ka process. Sabhi yaha par advance hota hai invoice nahi aata na. Invoice immediate aata hai to immediate payment ho jata hai. Advance ke liye hamare paas bahut process hota hai company mein.
Customer: Sir to matlab kya process kya karna hai? Matlab woh to sara sari cheez to aap hi dekhte honge payment wagera ka to.
Executive: Are sir mai dekhta hu accounts mein sab woh clearance milta hai, funds kya hota hai, payment hota hai uske baad sab approval hota hai mera account mein. Mujhe dekhna padta hai har baat ke liye. Mai bataunga mai bola na ho jayega aapka is week mein 1001% aapka payment ho jayega.
Customer: Sir sir is is week mein hamare do din working nahi hai. Saturday Sunday. Friday 28 tak hi hum log working hai.
Executive: Hmm to Friday tak ho jayega.
Customer: Sir bhi aap aaj bol rahe the. Hamare yaha Saturday Saturday tak hamare yaha Saturday tak hamari company mein se payment ho jayega aapko, mai usi din aapko payment link bhej du matlab receipt bhej du payment hoga invoice generate kar do.
Customer: Sir kya batau aapko badi problem hai yaha pe. Aapko sir mai ek baar bhej hi deta hu approval aap dekh lijiye waha pe kaise kaise maine hold karaya hua hai. Agar ho sakta hai sir isko process kar dijiye aaj kal mein.
Customer: Aisa na ho sir phir aap mere ko call kare aur mere ko sir renewal na le paau. Aapko karna hai isliye mai baar baar call kar raha hu.
Executive: Theek hai mai dekhta hu.
Customer: Theek hai sir koi nahi aap update kar dijiyega. Agar hota hai sir aaj kal mein sir mai apni team mein yehi update kar raha hu aaj kal mein renewal ho jayega. Agar sir ek do din bhi upar neeche hota hai to thoda sa price mein variance aa sakta hai.
Executive: Ho jayega, ho jayega. Aaj aaj kal mat kijiye 29 tarikh daal ke rakh dijiye maximum.
Customer: Sir 29 to mera working hi nahi hai.
Executive: 29 to mera working hi nahi hai. Uske pehle daal dijiye sir uske pehle ho jayega.
Customer: Sir mai keh raha hu 29 mera working hi nahi hai woh mai daal hi nahi sakta. 28 ko mujhe OVP bhi karana padega, aapka production bhi karana hota hai. Bilkul isliye sir hum log pehle grace leke chalte hai ki client se hum paanch saat din pehle payment le le. Taki sara time process karwa paaye. Unfortunately aapka date bhi 20 tarikh thi to aur upar se aapka tabiyat ka problem ho gaya.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Sir matlab 29 tak to for sure nahi ho payega. Ek do din pehle sir aap bata dijiye.
Executive: Theek hai dekhta hu mai. 25 tarikh hai. 26, 27, 28. Mai batata hu sir aapko. Mai batata hu. Aap sir mere ko kal 4 baje ek bar bata dijiye sir confirm karke. Mai kal tak ka approval daal raha hu usme yaha pe extend karne ka.
Executive: Theek hai, theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs payment to be processed quickly.

- Worried about price increase due to delay.

- Needs renewal done soon.



Resolution:

- Executive assured payment will be processed soon.

- Executive will confirm by tomorrow 4 PM.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will confirm by tomorrow 4 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- payment, approval, renewal, timeline, price
